message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?  It's a fair price considering the value this product brings.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,750? I'm really interested in this product, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.
